title: Walkercito, freelancer with +5 years of experience. Welcome!
description: Freelance programmer and 3D artist. Specializing in Python, TypeScript, and automation. Turning creative ideas into reality. EN/ES/IT.
name: Walkercito
about: Hey! I'm a freelance dev who loves building stuff with Python and TypeScript. I do a bit of everything - bots, web apps, automation scripts, you name it. Also super into 3D printing and modeling with Blender. Currently messing around with game dev in Godot and some Raspberry Pi projects. If you've got a cool idea, let's make it happen!

experience.title: DevOps & Backend Developer
experience.subtitle: Begonlabs
experience.description: Working on backend systems, scraping pipelines, AI integrations, and automation. Built data platforms, CRM backends, and institutional tools using Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and various cloud services.

experience.title: Freelance Programmer
experience.subtitle: Bots, web apps, and automation
experience.description: Been building Discord/Telegram bots, web apps, and random automation tools for clients. Mostly Python stuff but I jump into whatever's needed.

experience.title: 3D Artist
experience.subtitle: 3D printing & animation
experience.description: Did a bunch of 3D modeling and animation work, mainly for printing. Created custom designs and helped people bring their ideas to life.

projects.title: CETU
projects.subtitle: Institutional Management Tool
projects.description: Developed backend for Uruguay's Chamber of Technical Universities to manage students, courses, and academic programs. Built on self-hosted Supabase with role-based access and institutional compliance.

projects.title: ArcadiaNET
projects.subtitle: 90s-style IRC chatroom
projects.description: A throwback to the old-school IRC days. Real-time chat, emojis, retro vibes. Built it with Reflex just for fun and to learn the framework.

projects.title: OndAI
projects.subtitle: AI Agents + Integrated CRM
projects.description: Backend infrastructure for a SaaS platform providing AI agents for customer management and sales automation. Integrated multi-channel messaging (Messenger, WhatsApp, Instagram) with real-time customer interaction.

projects.title: BlueLights
projects.subtitle: Bluetooth LED Diagnostics Suite
projects.description: Python toolkit for discovering, controlling, and diagnosing Bluetooth LED strips. Includes device scanning, UUID mapping, stress tests, and remote control features using Bleak and a custom CLI.

projects.title: CopyClip
projects.subtitle: Linux Clipboard Manager
projects.description: Lightweight, open-source clipboard manager for Linux. Originally built with Python, with a planned migration to C++ for performance. Future UI planned using PyQt6 for better system integration.

projects.title: RitterFinder
projects.subtitle: Spain Industrial Data Platform
projects.description: Built and maintain the backend for a large-scale scraping system collecting business data from ~30 industrial directory sites across Spain. Handles geographic data, product info, and market availability using Python and Playwright.

projects.title: Crypto Exchange Bot
projects.subtitle: P2P Trading Automation
projects.description: Secure automated trading bot for peer-to-peer crypto exchanges in Discord. Handles ticket creation, balance management, payment verification, swap automation, and anti-fraud protection.

projects.title: Hacienda Automation
projects.subtitle: Document Scraping System
projects.description: Daily automated system for a government financial institution. Retrieves emails, downloads PDFs, extracts budget and contract data, and generates Excel reports with AI-powered summaries.

projects.title: Mr. Gato Landing
projects.subtitle: Astro landing page
projects.description: My first Astro project! Made a clean landing page for Mr. Gato's pricing. Was fun learning a new framework.

projects.title: Mr. Gato
projects.subtitle: Discord Music Bot
projects.description: Personal Discord bot that plays music from YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud, and Deezer. Extracts metadata (title, artist, cover) and intelligently searches YouTube for equivalent tracks from external links.

projects.title: Adeptus Studio
projects.subtitle: Multi-purpose Discord bot
projects.description: The Swiss army knife of Discord bots. Moderation, tickets, project management, payment tracking... basically everything my server needed.

projects.title: Home Automation
projects.subtitle: Raspberry Pi smart home
projects.description: Turned my place into a mini smart home with a Raspberry Pi. Control lights, check temps, that kind of stuff. Still adding features.

training.title: Self-Taught Software Developer
training.subtitle: Continuous Learning
training.description: Focused on computer science fundamentals, backend and frontend development, and practical software engineering through structured online programs and real-world projects.

training.title: CS50x: Introduction to Computer Science
training.subtitle: Harvard University
training.description: The classic Harvard CS course covering algorithms, data structures, memory management, web development, and software engineering fundamentals.

training.title: CS50P: Introduction to Programming with Python
training.subtitle: Harvard University
training.description: Deep dive into Python programming, covering functions, libraries, data structures, testing, file I/O, and regular expressions.

training.title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
training.subtitle: freeCodeCamp
training.description: Comprehensive course on JavaScript fundamentals, ES6, regular expressions, debugging, basic data structures, and algorithm scripting.

extras.title: Blog: ArcadiaNET
extras.description: The story behind building ArcadiaNET - what worked, what didn't, and lessons learned. Writing it up soon!

extras.title: Python Code Jam
extras.description: Competed with team 'ardent-andromedas' and we got 3rd place! Made a Discord bot around the 'Information Overload' theme.

extras.title: 3D Printing Projects
extras.description: A collection of my 3D printing work - custom designs, functional prints, and random experiments with Blender.
